Title: Righteous Fire, Righteous Fury
Description: Only one person remains standing between us and our city. Ready yourself--this won't be an easy fight.
ObjectivesText: Slay the leader of the Scarlet Crusade.
PortraitGiverText: The leader of the Scarlet Crusade that currently controls Gilneas. This probably won't be the last we see of the Crusade.
